Orbital instability would occur. Earth would crash with said planet or would be flung out somewhere.

Than digital media would replace physical paper media much faster. Also I would have a mob surrounding me right now.

then it would exist because you never asked, but that would mean it doesn't exist...

We would be happy.

Then people would have fight for the war of sanity
